channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Debugging
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Debugging

item.title: CVE-2021-24779|2024-08-03T19:42:17.194Z -- unknown -- wp%20debugging
item.description: The WP Debugging WordPress plugin before 2.11.0 has its update_settings() function hooked to admin_init and is missing any authorisation and CSRF checks, as a result, the settings can be updated by unauthenticated users.
